{"id":1150561824,"question_id":29,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"4 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1705655572,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1150561824/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Divide Two Integers","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int divide(int dividend, int divisor) {\n        // use bit manipulation to replace mul\n\n        int a = dividend;\n        int b = divisor;\n\n        int sign =  (a>0==b>0) ? 1 : -1;\n\n        a = Math.abs(a);\n        b = Math.abs(b);\n\n        long quotient = 0;\n\n        while(a>=b){\n            long c=b;\n            long cnt=1;\n            while((c<<1)<=a){\n                c<<=1;\n                cnt<<=1;\n            }\n            a-=c;\n            quotient+=cnt;\n\n        }\n\n        if(quotient >= Integer.MAX_VALUE)\n            return Integer.MAX_VALUE;\n\n        return sign * (int)quotient;\n\n        /*\n\n        a/b = ? => a= b*2\n\n        b*2\n        b*4\n        b*8\n        b*16\n        ...\n\n        */\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"divide-two-integers","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
